extension.summary: Experimental Google Music audio plugin
extension.description: Plugin that lets you play music from Google Music.

extension.summary: A music streaming collection
extension.description: Browse and stream your favourite songs and albums

extension.summary: Put all your favourites bits of all your favourites addons into one easy to use addon.
extension.description: Super Favourites is a better way of managing your Kodi Favourites.[CR][CR]Virtually any menu item within Kodi can be added to Super Favourites, even from addons that don't normally provide this feature.[CR][CR]Super Favourites allows you to better manage your Kodi favourites, including the creation of sub-folders, into which your Kodi favourites can then be copied or moved into.[CR][CR]This allows you to create you own custom addon with just the best bits of your favourite addons. Search your favourite addons, play your favourite music, read your favourite comic strips, select your favourite playlists, browse your favourite movies, listen to your favourite radio stations, watch your favourite cartoons, the possibilities are endless, all from within one easy to use addon.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: All the best from channelpear.com
extension.description:
The channel PEAR media database is 100% maintained by users like you! Share media sources with fellow channel PEAR users and discover a whole world of live streaming channels from around the globe! http://channelpear.com You can now enter your custom Plex URL in the addon settings. You can get your custom Plex URL from your library at https://channelpear.com/library/ (must be logged in - click the "Plex Channel" link at the top right of the page).
This addon is based on code from LiveStreamspro from Shani. All credit to Shani and other devs involved.

extension.summary: This unblockr.net plugin ensures your registered IP is kept up to date
extension.description: This plugin will run at startup each time XBMC is run. It calls a special function within Unblockr that will check your current IP address and make sure that Unblockr knows what it is. If you're on the move, you can use the Unblockr Android, or Iphone App to do the same thing. So if you're round at a friend's house and fancy catching the latest Icefilms release, use the app. At home, forget all about it and let us do the work.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Install add-ons from the SuperRepo All Repository
Installeer add-ons uit de SuperRepo All Repository
Inštalácia add-ons zo SuperRepo All Repozitár
Installation von Addons aus dem SuperRepo All Repository
Instale add-ons do SuperRepo All Repositório
Instale add-ons do SuperRepo All Repositório
extension.description: Download and install add-ons for Kodi in the category "All" using SuperRepo.[CR][CR]By using SuperRepo repositories you will be able to take advantage of our serverside dependency checking, extensive file mirror service and many more.[CR]Visit our website at https://superrepo.org/ to browse the add-ons, create personal addon bundles and install whole bundles at once![CR][CR]

Download and installeer add-ons voor Kodi in de categorie "All" via SuperRepo.[CR]Door SuperRepo te installeren kunt u profiteren van onze controle van add-ons en ons uitgebreide server netwerk. Bezoek onze website op https://superrepo.org om door de add-ons te bladeren, persoonlijke add-on bundels te maken en complete bundels in 1 keer te installeren![CR][CR]

Preber a inštaluj add-ons do kategórie "All" z SuperRepo.org add-on repozitár.[CR][CR]Ak si našiel add-on ktorý je poškodený alebo nefunkčný, alebo chceš pridať nový add-on, potom prosím pozri na https://superrepo.org/[CR][CR]Repozitár je udržiavaný komunitou Kodi a za pomoci SuperRepo Wiki, a tento preberá add-ons z rôznych zdrojov. Vzhľadom na to, SuperRepo nenesie žiadnu zodpovednosť za služby poskytované týmito add-ons.[CR][CR]Rozšírený repozitár vyvinul Bart Otten[CR][CR]

Lade und installiere Addons der Kategorie "All" aus dem SuperRepo.org Addon Repository.[CR][CR]Möchtest du ein fehlerhaftes Addon melden oder ein neues Addon vorschlagen, kannst du dies über unsere Webseite http://superrepo.org tun.[CR][CR]Das Repository wird mit Hilfe des SuperRepo Wiki durch die Kodi Community gepflegt und durch unseren Generator aus mehreren Quellen zusammengestellt. Daher übernimmt SuperRepo keinerlei Verantwortung für diesen Service.[CR][CR]Der"eXtended Reposity Generator" wird durch Bart Otten entwickelt.[CR][CR]

Baixe e instale o add-ons na categoria "All" do Repositório SuperRepo.org. [CR] [CR] Se você encontrar um add-on quebrado ou não funcionando, ou você gostaria de incluir um outro, por favor visite https://superrepo.org/ [CR] [CR]O repositório é mantida pela comunidade do Kodi usando o Wiki do SuperRepo e o nosso gerador de busca de add-ons múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo não aceita qualquer responsabilidade por esse serviço.[CR][CR]O Gerador Reposity eXtended é desenvolvido por Bart Otten[CR][CR]

Baixe e instale o add-ons na categoria "All" do Repositório SuperRepo.org. [CR] [CR] Se você encontrar um add-on quebrado ou não funcionando, ou você gostaria de incluir um outro, por favor visite https://superrepo.org/ [CR][CR]O repositório é mantida pela comunidade do Kodi usando o Wiki do SuperRepo e o nosso gerador de busca de add-ons múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo não aceita qualquer responsabilidade por esse serviço.[CR][CR]O Gerador Reposity eXtended é desenvolvido por Bart Otten[CR][CR]
extension.disclaimer: The SuperRepo generator fetches addons from multiple sources. Therefore SuperRepo accepts no responsibility for included addons.[CR]
De SuperRepo generator verzamelt addons van verschillende bronnen. Daarom accepteert SuperRepo geen enkele verantwoordelijkheid voor de ingevoegde addons.[CR]

Repozitár je udržiavaný komunitou Kodi a za pomoci SuperRepo Wiki, a tento preberá addons z rôznych zdrojov. Vzhľadom na to, SuperRepo nenesie žiadnu zodpovednosť za služby poskytované týmito addons.[CR]

O repositório é mantido pela comunidade comunidade do Kodi e o nosso gerador de busca de addons de múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo aceita não se responsabiliza por addons incluídos.[CR]

extension.summary: Install add-ons from the SuperRepo Genre Live-TV Repository
Installeer add-ons uit de SuperRepo Genre Live-TV Repository
Inštalácia add-ons zo SuperRepo Genre Live-TV Repozitár
Installation von Addons aus dem SuperRepo Genre Live-TV Repository
Instale add-ons do SuperRepo Genre Live-TV Repositório
Instale add-ons do SuperRepo Genre Live-TV Repositório
extension.description: Download and install add-ons for Kodi in the category "Live-TV" using SuperRepo.[CR][CR]By using SuperRepo repositories you will be able to take advantage of our serverside dependency checking, extensive file mirror service and many more.[CR]Visit our website at https://superrepo.org/ to browse the add-ons, create personal addon bundles and install whole bundles at once![CR][CR]

Download and installeer add-ons voor Kodi in de categorie "Live-TV" via SuperRepo.[CR]Door SuperRepo te installeren kunt u profiteren van onze controle van add-ons en ons uitgebreide server netwerk. Bezoek onze website op https://superrepo.org om door de add-ons te bladeren, persoonlijke add-on bundels te maken en complete bundels in 1 keer te installeren![CR][CR]

Preber a inštaluj add-ons do kategórie "Live-TV" z SuperRepo.org add-on repozitár.[CR][CR]Ak si našiel add-on ktorý je poškodený alebo nefunkčný, alebo chceš pridať nový add-on, potom prosím pozri na https://superrepo.org/[CR][CR]Repozitár je udržiavaný komunitou Kodi a za pomoci SuperRepo Wiki, a tento preberá add-ons z rôznych zdrojov. Vzhľadom na to, SuperRepo nenesie žiadnu zodpovednosť za služby poskytované týmito add-ons.[CR][CR]Rozšírený repozitár vyvinul Bart Otten[CR][CR]

Lade und installiere Addons der Kategorie "Live-TV" aus dem SuperRepo.org Addon Repository.[CR][CR]Möchtest du ein fehlerhaftes Addon melden oder ein neues Addon vorschlagen, kannst du dies über unsere Webseite http://superrepo.org tun.[CR][CR]Das Repository wird mit Hilfe des SuperRepo Wiki durch die Kodi Community gepflegt und durch unseren Generator aus mehreren Quellen zusammengestellt. Daher übernimmt SuperRepo keinerlei Verantwortung für diesen Service.[CR][CR]Der"eXtended Reposity Generator" wird durch Bart Otten entwickelt.[CR][CR]

Baixe e instale o add-ons na categoria "Live-TV" do Repositório SuperRepo.org. [CR] [CR] Se você encontrar um add-on quebrado ou não funcionando, ou você gostaria de incluir um outro, por favor visite https://superrepo.org/ [CR] [CR]O repositório é mantida pela comunidade do Kodi usando o Wiki do SuperRepo e o nosso gerador de busca de add-ons múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo não aceita qualquer responsabilidade por esse serviço.[CR][CR]O Gerador Reposity eXtended é desenvolvido por Bart Otten[CR][CR]

Baixe e instale o add-ons na categoria "Live-TV" do Repositório SuperRepo.org. [CR] [CR] Se você encontrar um add-on quebrado ou não funcionando, ou você gostaria de incluir um outro, por favor visite https://superrepo.org/ [CR][CR]O repositório é mantida pela comunidade do Kodi usando o Wiki do SuperRepo e o nosso gerador de busca de add-ons múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo não aceita qualquer responsabilidade por esse serviço.[CR][CR]O Gerador Reposity eXtended é desenvolvido por Bart Otten[CR][CR]

extension.disclaimer: The SuperRepo generator fetches addons from multiple sources. Therefore SuperRepo accepts no responsibility for included addons.[CR]
De SuperRepo generator verzamelt addons van verschillende bronnen. Daarom accepteert SuperRepo geen enkele verantwoordelijkheid voor de ingevoegde addons.[CR]

Repozitár je udržiavaný komunitou Kodi a za pomoci SuperRepo Wiki, a tento preberá addons z rôznych zdrojov. Vzhľadom na to, SuperRepo nenesie žiadnu zodpovednosť za služby poskytované týmito addons.[CR]

Das Repository wird durch die Kodi Community gepflegt und durch unseren Generator aus mehreren Quellen zusammengestellt. Daher übernimmt SuperRepo keinerlei Verantwortung für die enthaltenen Addons.[CR]
O repositório é mantido pela comunidade comunidade do Kodi e o nosso gerador de busca de addons de múltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo aceita não se responsabiliza por addons incluídos.[CR]
